title: ambalattil ADum
sahitya:
mbalattil ADum kUttA unran ATTam kurippadenna shol tillai


anupallavi

  tumburAdi munivra dEvargaL pOTrit-tudigaL pADi ninru magizhavE tillai


caraNam    Damarugam olippadennavO suramtanil tazhalai Endi nirppadennavO
amarumenru kATTAl ennavO malar aDiyilonru tUkkalennavO tillai
